dev_mode_disabled.title: Development Mode Disabled
dev_mode_disabled.desc: To unlock some features, you need to enable development mode.

success.title: The theme has been saved successfully!
success.desc: The changes will be visible after the app is rebuilt.

diagnostic.title: Diagnostic Tools
diagnostic.desc: Use these tools to diagnose and fix common issues with your website.

clear_cache.title: Clear Cache
clear_cache.desc: This action clean up the cache of your website. This can help fix issues with your website but may slow down your website temporarily.

email.footer: You're receiving this email because your account activity triggered this email. Please do not reply to this email. If you have any questions, please contact us at:

main.title: Main Settings
main.desc: These settings are used to configure the main features of your website.

contact_email.label: Contact Email
contact_email.desc: This email address will be applied to the contact form and other contact points on your website.

email.title: Email
email.desc: Send emails from your website. Unlock more features like password reset, email verification, and more.

success.title: Email has been sent
success.desc: Check your email inbox to see if you received the email.

test.subject: Test Email from AdminCP VitNode
test.message: This email confirms that your email settings in your website by VitNode are working correctly.
test.preview_text: Preview text test email from AdminCP VitNode

captcha.title: Captcha
captcha.desc: Captcha is a security feature that requires users to complete a challenge to prove they are human. This helps prevent spam and abuse.

force_login.title: Force Login
force_login.desc: Force users to log in before they can access your website.

lock_register.title: Lock Register
lock_register.desc: Don't allow users to register on your website.

require_confirm_email.title: Require Confirm Email
require_confirm_email.desc: Require users to confirm their email address before they can access your site.

legal.title: Legal & Policies
legal.desc: These settings are used to generate the legal pages on your website.

code.title: Code
code.desc: Code should be unique. This code is used to generate the URL of the policy page.
code.preview_url: Preview URL of the policy page: <url></url>
code.already_exists: Policy with this code already exists.

delete.title: Delete Policy
delete.desc: This action will delete the policy <name></name>.

ai.title: Artificial Intelligence (AI)
ai.desc: Integrate powerful Artificial Intelligence to boost user experience with personalized content, smarter search, SEO optimization and more.

testing.title: Test Your AI
testing.desc: Here you can test your AI to see how it works.
testing.response_success: If you see the response, your AI is working correctly.

manifest.title: Manifest
manifest.desc: The web app manifest provides information about an application (such as name, author, icon, and description) in a JSON text file. The manifest is used to install the web application (PWA) to the home screen of a device.

display.label: Display
display.desc: The display property controls how the app is displayed.

fullscreen.title: Fullscreen
fullscreen.desc: Without any browser UI and any device UI.

start_url.label: Start URL
start_url.desc: When user launches the app, this is the page that will be loaded.

warn_req_restart_server.title: Required Restart Server
warn_req_restart_server.desc: We're detected changes in <bold>the plugin system</bold>. To apply these changes, you need to <bold>restart the server</bold>.

code.label: Code
code.exists: Navigation with this code already exists.

keywords.label: Keywords
keywords.desc: Keywords are used to search for this navigation. Separate by comma.

id.label: ID
id.exists: Permission with this ID already exists.

delete.desc: This action will delete the permission <id></id>. Remember to delete all conditions associated with this permission.

children_warn.title: This permission has children
children_warn.desc: If you delete this permission, all children will be deleted too.

code.label: Code
code.desc: Must be unique. Min 3-50 characters. Allowed characters: a-z, 0-9, -
code.exists: Plugin with this code already exists. If you want to update the plugin, use the upload new version form from the plugin dropdown menu.

support_url.label: Support URL
support_url.desc: URL to the support page for this plugin.

upload.title: Upload Plugin
upload.info: After uploading the plugin, you need to restart the server to apply the changes.

errors.PLUGIN_ALREADY_EXISTS: Plugin with this code already exists. If you want to update the plugin, use the upload new version form from the plugin dropdown menu.
errors.PLUGIN_VERSION_IS_LOWER: The version of the uploaded plugin is lower than the current version.

delete.desc: This action will delete <name></name> plugin created by <author></author> and all data associated with it.
delete.info: You may see the errors while the system is changing files. After the process is complete, you need to restart the server to apply the changes.

external.label: External link?
external.desc: The link will open in a new tab.

delete.desc_with_children: You have sub-navigations. If you delete this navigation, all sub-navigations will be moved to the parent navigation.

sticky.label: Sticky Toolbar
sticky.desc: The toolbar will be fixed at the top of the screen.

code.label: Code
code.desc: This code uses as a language identifier in your URL, like: /en/page

allow_in_input.label: Allow in Input
allow_in_input.desc: Allow users to select this language in the input field.

default.label: Default
default.desc: Set this language as the default language for your applications.

delete.text: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete this language and all user content associated with it. This may impact your app's SEO.
delete.form_confirm_text: Type the name of the language <text></text> to confirm.

delete.desc: This action will delete the file <name></name>.
delete.uses_warning: This file is used in other part of the system.

info.title: Info User
info.not_email_verified: This user has not verified their email address.

delete.title: Delete User
delete.desc: This action will delete the user <name></name> and all data associated with it permanently.

delete_admin.title: You cannot delete this admin
delete_admin.desc: Please remove the admin permissions before deleting this user.

max_storage_for_submit.label: Max Storage for Submit
max_storage_for_submit.desc: If you set 1000, user can upload only 1 file with size 1000kB or 2 files with size 500kB for each submit.

delete.text: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete this group and all users in it will be moved to the default group.
delete.form_confirm_text: Type the name of the group <text></text> to confirm.

shared.already_exists: This permission is already on the list.

unrestricted.title: Unrestricted
unrestricted.desc: Unrestricted administrators have full access to the admin control panel (AdminCP).

moderators.title: Moderators
moderators.desc: Manage access to the moderator panel (ModCP).

delete.desc: This action will deprive the user or users of this group of access to the moderator panel (ModCP).

administrators.title: Administrators
administrators.desc: Manage access to the administrator panel (AdminCP).

delete.desc: This action will deprive the user or users of this group of access to the administrator panel (AdminCP).
